text: Lodewijk van den Berg (; March 24, 1932 â€“ October 16, 2022) was a Dutch-born American chemical engineer. He flew on a 1985 Space Shuttle Challenger mission as a payload specialist. Van den Berg was born in the Netherlands and was a naturalized American and not a Dutch citizen when he flew on the Challenger.
